member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.Controllers.DataEnhancementController
member.summary:
Data Enhancement API Controller for phone number enrichment. BDD Feature: REST API Endpoint for Phone Number Enrichment BDD File: features/phase1/feature-1.1-rest-api-endpoint.feature
NOTE: This is Slice 3 implementation with CQRS/MediatR pattern. Controller is thin - all business logic in LookupQueryHandler. Future slices will add: authentication, database lookup, FCRA audit logging, rate limiting.

member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto
member.summary: Request DTO for phone number enrichment lookup. Maps to BDD Scenario 1-3: Basic fields, full fields, and optional fields for improved matching. BDD File: features/phase1/feature-1.1-rest-api-endpoint.feature

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.ProviderCode
member.summary: Provider code identifying the data source (required) Expected value: "EQUIFAX_ENRICHMENT"

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.Phone
member.summary: Phone number to enrich (required) Supports multiple formats - will be normalized using PhoneNumber value object BDD Scenario 7: Phone number format validation BDD Scenario 10: Phone number normalization

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.PermissiblePurpose
member.summary: FCRA-compliant permissible purpose for data access (required) Valid values: insurance_underwriting, credit_extension, employment_screening, tenant_screening, legitimate_business_need BDD Scenario 8: Permissible purpose validation

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.Fields
member.summary: Fields to return: "basic" (~50 fields) or "full" (398 fields) Defaults to "basic" if not specified BDD Scenario 2: Full dataset request BDD Scenario 11: Default fields selection

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.FirstName
member.summary: Consumer first name (optional, improves match confidence)

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.LastName
member.summary: Consumer last name (optional, improves match confidence)

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.PostalCode
member.summary: 5-digit US postal code (optional, improves match confidence)

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.State
member.summary: 2-letter US state code (optional, improves match confidence)

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.IpAddress
member.summary: IPv4 address (optional, for additional context)

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDto.UniqueId
member.summary: Client-provided unique identifier for request tracking (optional) Returned in response metadata for correlation BDD Scenario 12: Metadata completeness

member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupResponseDto
member.summary: Response DTO for successful phone number enrichment lookup. BDD Scenarios 1, 2, 3: Success responses with data BDD File: features/phase1/feature-1.1-rest-api-endpoint.feature

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupResponseDto.Response
member.summary: Response status: "success" or "error"

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupResponseDto.Message
member.summary: Human-readable message describing the result Example: "Record found with high confidence"

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupResponseDto.Data
member.summary: Enrichment data payload (null for error responses) BDD Scenario 1: Contains ~50 fields for "basic" BDD Scenario 2: Contains 398 fields for "full"

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupResponseDto.Metadata
member.summary: Response metadata for tracking and monitoring BDD Scenario 12: Complete metadata requirements

member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.EnrichmentDataDto
member.summary: Enrichment data structure containing consumer information. BDD Scenario 1: Basic structure with personal info, addresses, phones, financial

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.EnrichmentDataDto.ConsumerKey
member.summary: Equifax consumer key identifier

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.EnrichmentDataDto.PersonalInfo
member.summary: Personal information (name, age, etc.) Placeholder for now - will be expanded in later iterations

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.EnrichmentDataDto.Addresses
member.summary: Address history Placeholder for now - will be expanded in later iterations

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.EnrichmentDataDto.Phones
member.summary: Phone number history Placeholder for now - will be expanded in later iterations

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.EnrichmentDataDto.Financial
member.summary: Financial information Placeholder for now - will be expanded in later iterations

member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ResponseMetadataDto
member.summary: Response metadata for tracking, monitoring, and auditing. BDD Scenario 12: Complete metadata requirements (Lines 285-306)

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ResponseMetadataDto.MatchConfidence
member.summary: Match confidence score (0.0 to 1.0) BDD Scenario 3: Should be > 0.90 with optional fields

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ResponseMetadataDto.MatchType
member.summary: Type of match performed (e.g., "phone_only", "phone_with_name")

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ResponseMetadataDto.DataFreshnessDate
member.summary: Date when the data was last updated (ISO 8601 format) BDD Scenario 12: Valid ISO 8601 date

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ResponseMetadataDto.QueryTimestamp
member.summary: Timestamp when the query was executed (UTC) BDD Scenario 12: Current UTC timestamp

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ResponseMetadataDto.RequestId
member.summary: Server-generated request ID (UUID format) BDD Scenario 12: Non-empty UUID format

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ResponseMetadataDto.UniqueId
member.summary: Client-provided unique ID (echoed from request) BDD Scenario 3, 12: Optional tracking identifier

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ResponseMetadataDto.TotalFieldsReturned
member.summary: Total number of fields returned (null for basic, 398 for full) BDD Scenario 2: Should show 398 for full dataset BDD Scenario 11: null for basic (default)

member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ErrorResponseDto
member.summary: Error response DTO for failed lookups. BDD Scenario 4: No match found BDD Scenario 5: Invalid API key BDD Scenario 6: Missing required fields BDD Scenario 7: Invalid phone format BDD Scenario 8: Invalid permissible purpose

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ErrorResponseDto.Response
member.summary: Response status: always "error"

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ErrorResponseDto.Message
member.summary: Error message describing what went wrong

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ErrorResponseDto.Data
member.summary: Optional error details (e.g., phone number attempted for no-match) BDD Scenario 4: Includes phone, match_attempted, match_confidence

member.name: P:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.ErrorResponseDto.Metadata
member.summary: Metadata (present for some errors, absent for others) BDD Scenario 4: No match includes metadata BDD Scenario 5: Invalid API key does NOT include metadata

member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDtoValidator
member.summary: FluentValidation validator for LookupRequestDto. Implements validation rules from BDD Scenarios 6, 7, 8, 11. BDD File: features/phase1/feature-1.1-rest-api-endpoint.feature

member.name: M:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDtoValidator.BeValidPhoneNumber(System.String)
member.summary: Validates phone number using PhoneNumber value object. BDD Scenario 7: Invalid Phone Number Format BDD Scenario 10: Phone normalization handling Lines 182-269

member.name: M:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDtoValidator.BeValidPermissiblePurpose(System.String)
member.summary: Validates permissible purpose against FCRA-compliant list. BDD Scenario 8: Invalid Permissible Purpose Lines 207-220

member.name: M:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDtoValidator.BeValidFieldsOption(System.String)
member.summary: Validates fields parameter against allowed values. BDD Scenario 2: Full dataset request BDD Scenario 11: Default fields selection

member.name: M:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.DTOs.LookupRequestDtoValidator.BeValidIpAddress(System.String)
member.summary: Validates IPv4 address format. BDD Scenario 3: Optional fields validation Requires exactly 4 octets (xxx.xxx.xxx.xxx)

member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.Middleware.ApiKeyAuthenticationMiddleware
member.summary:
API Key Authentication Middleware with timing-attack prevention. BDD Feature: API Key Authentication (feature-2.1-api-key-authentication.feature)
SECURITY CRITICAL: - BDD Scenario 4: Uses CryptographicOperations.FixedTimeEquals() to prevent timing attacks (CVE-2025-59425) - BDD Scenario 8: Compares SHA-256 hashes, NEVER plaintext keys - BDD Scenario 23: Constant-time hash comparison

member.name: M:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.Middleware.ApiKeyAuthenticationMiddleware.ComputeSha256Hash(System.String)
member.summary: Computes SHA-256 hash of API key and returns Base64-encoded string. BDD Scenario 8: Store API key as SHA-256 hash in database

member.name: M:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.Middleware.ApiKeyAuthenticationMiddleware.PerformDummyTimingAttackMitigation(System.String)
member.summary:
Performs a dummy constant-time operation to prevent timing attacks. BDD Scenario 4: Use constant-time comparison to prevent timing attacks
When API key is not found, we still perform a hash comparison against a dummy value to ensure the response time is constant regardless of whether the key exists.

member.name: M:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.Middleware.ApiKeyAuthenticationMiddleware.WriteUnauthorizedResponse(Microsoft.AspNetCore.Http.HttpContext,System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Writes 401 Unauthorized response with error details. BDD Scenario 2, 3, 5: Return 401 for authentication failures BDD Scenario 22: Never log full API keys (security best practice)

member.name: T:EquifaxEnrichmentAPI.Api.Middleware.ApiKeyAuthenticationMiddlewareExtensions
member.summary: Extension method to register API Key Authentication Middleware.
